headline: Berkshire Hathaway: Buffett Didn't Invest Much On The Way Out
summary: Berkshire Hathaway's Q1 results show falling revenues, growing cash pile, and leadership change as Warren Buffett steps down in 2026. Read why BRK is a Sell.
